summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2669 for the improvement of Seattle Boulevard, from Connecticut Street to Ninth Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of a wooden box sewer of the proper dimensions, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 31437, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
